data.text: @Qchike All were good and the donut was freshly made, nothing can beat that thin crisp outside and doughy texture inside 🥰
@Nikitalynn I'm glad you like it! Congee is easy to digest and can contain more nutrient depends on the ingredients, I hope more people will fall in love with it.
@javierabegazo And it was! This restaurant have kept their food quality even under the pandemic~ 🥰
@MingwLee Hope you are feeling better now! That congee and the donut look so yum😋

@MingwLee I had an old coworker introduce me to Congee back in Toronto. They asked me if trusted them enough to order for me. I let him and then this wonder came out.  Now I am hungry just thinking about it.
@MingwLee gosh this looks excellent! I love congee so much
